description: You can view the projects stored in a DSNWRK file via the "Projects" panel in Altium Designer. In this panel, you can create a project group, access individual documents in projects, and add projects to project groups.
To create a DSNWRK file, select File â†’ Save Project Group As in the main menu of Altium Designer. Or, you can right-click a location in the "Projects" panel, then click Save Project Group As .
